subject: FW: Info for Heath
preview: @joel can you please have a read of the below and let me know if anything is not clear?   Thanks

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@joel can you please have a read of the below and let me know if anything is not clear?

Thanks

Hello,

Sorry for the delay in getting back to you. I’ve started this email 5 times and then been distracted.

Please see below re the new site:

Short Term Hire
Add an “i” button next to “Total Weeks” and “Total Rental Price” which, when you hover over, says “The longer you hire for the lower the weekly rate. If your hire period is less than 4 weeks, there is a short term hire fee. If your hire period is over 4 weeks you will receive 2 weeks free”
We also need to includes a “Short Term Hire Fee” for any rental that is 1, 2 or 3 weeks. Please add the same “i” button next to that as noted above.

Calendar
We need to fit in a lot of info here so I’m just trying to think how we can do it without it getting too confusing! I’m wondering if we should stick to the Dashboard terms for the calendar and only add notes (with a red / orange banner) when it’s something that needs to be actioned from our end…no note means no action needed! I can then scan the calendar quickly to see if action is needed.
Draft
Selection
Delivery Date TBC – red banner
Closed for selection (for jobs past the selection phase but not yet submitted) – red banner
Confirmed
Not Paid – red banner
Past Delivery Date – orange banner
Delivered
Not Paid – red banner
Pick Up Date TBC – red banner
Processing
Not Paid – red banner
Past Pick Up Date – orange banner
Collected
Is it possible to make it that if you click on the date (i.e. the 1 in the 1st of April) it opens the day, meaning we don’t need a “View Day” button.
As there are sometimes too many jobs on a day to view at a glance, and they don’t all fit in the box, if something needs to be actions (i.e. it has a red or orange banner) can we highlight the date somehow.

Selection Fee for accessories
As previously discussed, I would like to add “Huntley + Co to select decor” option to all quotes. Clients must click, “Yes or “No”. The pricing will be based on the number of items listed.
$0 Up to 10 items
11-20 $50
21-30 $100
31-40 $150
41-50 $200
51-60 $250
61 or more $300
We will need to put this wording somewhere “Don’t have time to come into the showroom to select your décor? Don’t worry, we have you covered! If you would like us to help you with selecting your décor you will need to contact the office 3-5 business days prior to delivery and we will discuss the brief with you over the phone. Furniture selections must be complete prior to the décor selection process commencing. If you have photos that you can send through it will help us to get the look just right! We will then send you photos of the key pieces such as art, rugs and lamps. Once approved we can fine tune the smaller items such as the accessories and cushions. Please note that Huntley + Co take no responsibility for change of mind on accessories that we have selected on your behalf and if items need to be swapped there will be a swap fee.
Payment
As mentioned previously, I would like to make sure all clients add a credit card when booking a job but give them the flexibility that they can still pay the initial payment via EFT but ongoing must be done by card (I am spending way too much time chasing ongoing!). One the “Step 2/2” Payment page, can we please say:
Pay for order
Existing Card
Credit Card
EFT
Pay for additional weeks
Existing Card
Credit Card
I would also like to add the following somewhere “Please note that you will be notified, via email, 1 week prior to the end of the initial contract to confirm if you would like to extend. If you would like to arrange collection, please notify us at least 2 business days prior to the end of the contract. If we have not heard from you, 2 business days prior to the end of the initial contract, the contract will continue on a week to week basis, and your credit card will be charged accordingly, until the collection is logged.
Other
Phil has also asked if there is an option to refresh or go back on scanners as the Scanners often freeze and you can’t go back or refresh at the moment. Feel free to call him if that doesn’t make sense.
Please make the button to choose if a TV is wall mounted or not a compulsory field, the same as Risk Protection. Please remove “both” as an option.
Please stop the “Client Name” from being a compulsory field.
>
> Thank you!
>
> Kind Regards
> Amy Smith
>
>
> AMY SMITH
> CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR - HUNTLEY + CO <https://huntleyandco.com.au/>
> E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>
